title: "An Unknown Error Has Occurred" keeps popping up
body: This error constantly keeps popping up in my LoL Client, I close it but a few minutes later it'll show up again. I don't think there's anything wrong with my connection, I never really need to reconnect to PVP. I have tried re-downloading League but that hasn't worked out either.

replies.body: When exactly is this error coming up, and what are you seeing?  Are you using any third party programs like overlays or play.tv?  If so, can you remove them and let me know if that fixes it.  Let me know!

This error always shows up when I start the LoL client, I log in and a few minutes later it'll pop up I close it but it will pop up again a few minutes later. After I play a game multiple will pop up, and I'll have to close each one. I use Razer Cortex and Razer Synpase, I will try uninstall those and see if that does anything however, I've had those for a few months now but my problem only started showing up recently. https://gyazo.com/e4f2d59b5d8262105dd05b18790c9078

Pvp.net will try and reconnect automatically, and it sound like while you do have some connection it's a pretty unstable one.  Start out by going over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network strength.  I hope that helps!
I am having the same problem with no 3rd party programs. It happens even when League is the only thing open. Did you ever find a solution?
